content.question: The “Great Awakening” refers to the

choices.label: growth of European awareness of the New World in the 1500’s
impact of the Enlightenment on colonial thought in the early 1700’s
wave of religious revivals that swept the colonies in the 1740’s
beginning of the colonial movement toward independence from Great Britain
growth of technology that contributed to increased industrialization in the early 1800’s

content.answer: wave of religious revivals that swept the colonies in the 1740’s

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
